snippet: Muve, a subscription service for prepaid mobile phones, will be discontinued in February and customers will be moved to Deezer, the company said.
abstract: Deezer, attempting to break into the American music streaming market, will acquire Muve Music, subscription service for prepaid mobile phones that caters to largely-ignored low-income consumers.
lead_paragraph: Muve, a subscription service for prepaid mobile phones, will be discontinued in February and customers will be moved to Deezer, the company said.

headline.main: French Streaming Service Acquires Toehold in the U.S.
headline.print_headline: French Streaming Service Acquires Toehold in the U.S.
